root.name: Disgaea 2: Dark Hero Days
root.description: Overview Disgaea 2: Dark Hero Days is a port of the original Disgaea 2 game for the Playstation 2. This game was released on September 6th, 2009 for the PSP system in America by Nippon Ichi Software Inc. In the game, you play as Adell, a Demon Hunter who's family has been turned into demons by Overlord Zennon. In a strange summoning ritual, Adell's mother summons forth from a cauldron the daughter of Lord Zennon, Rozalin. With Rozalin bounded to her captors, she must lead Adell to the home of her father so that he may battle him and save the souls of his family and loved ones. But, since Rozalin is a demon, will she lead him to the correct location or try to kill him along the way?
